subtitleNullable: Collection of images of 3D models ranked by aesthetic value
descriptionNullable:
### Content

This dataset consists of 2491 images of size 240 x 160 RGB in png file format. Each file name starts with a number between 01 and 10 that represents the aesthetic score assigned to the image on a scale from 1 to 10. The aesthetic score was assigned by the author based on similarity to the work of Giorgio Morandi (July 20, 1890 – June 18, 1964) an Italian painter and printmaker who specialized in still life.  Example: filename "01_M04_0018.png" has a score of 01. Filename "08_M04_0025.png" has a score of 08.

- There are few "noise" images in the dataset.


### Inspiration

- Classification on the images after extracting the individual aesthetic score from the filename.
- Object detection and image segmentation.
- Anomaly detection.
